summary: Kinda like Tentapalooza ... but for Enderal.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798][img]http://i.imgur.com/kPyl4AD.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center]I couldn't use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72220/?]Tentapalooza[/url] with Enderal because of the DLC requirements, so I made this.
Any future Campfire goodies I make specifically for Enderal will be as an update to this. Track if you like it![/center]





FEATURES
Integration with the following Campfire functions:
[list]
[*]Working lantern(s)
[*]View toggle
[*]Armor/Weapon removal (all possible slots)
[*]Snow/Ash accumulation
[*]Flammability
[*]Pet support
[/list]
[b]Note:[/b] There are no follower beds at this time because standard followers aren't part of Enderal. I did add pet support because it was simple to do, so if you have a mod-added pet it should theoretically use the included lie-down markers.


BEACH STUFF
[b]Castaway's Tent
[/b][i]Beachy makeshift shelter suitable for any starting character
[/i][b]Requires schematic?[/b]Â no
[b]Craftable at: [/b]survival menu
[b]Extras:[/b] built-in storage



CREDITS/PERMISSIONS
Use anything you like from here as long as credit is given. The following asset creators must also be credited:



Enderal team: castaway tent shelter
Jokerine: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58164/?]seashell[/url]
author: Ruse
